plays.text: Goal scored by Jamal Mayers assisted by Ray Ferraro and Tyson Nash

Penalty to Lyle Odelein 10 minutes for Game Misconduct Jamal Mayers
Penalty to Tyson Nash 10 minutes for Misconduct Lyle Odelein
